title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate new customer engagement and revenue growth (PEX101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速新客户参与和收入增长 (PEX101)
abstract: Join this session to dive deep into new customer engagement, growth, and retention strategies that can scale from small businesses to large enterprises. Learn about AWS Partner best practices, programs, resources, and incentives to help you acquire new customer relationships and grow presence as their strategic advisor. We will provide insights on customer trends, go-to-market activities, point-of-entry solutions, new AWS partner program launches, and co-sell with AWS strategy. AWS takes a “Partner First” mentality in new customer engagement because we believe that together, partners and AWS can help customers innovate and accelerate their business growth.
abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，深入了解可从小型企业扩展到大型企业的新客户参与、增长和留存策略。了解 AWS 合作伙伴最佳实践、计划、资源和激励措施，帮助您获取新客户关系并发展成为他们的战略顾问。我们将提供有关客户趋势、市场推广活动、切入点解决方案、AWS 合作伙伴计划新发布以及与 AWS 联合销售策略的见解。AWS 在新客户参与中秉持"合作伙伴优先"的理念，因为我们相信合作伙伴与 AWS 携手合作，能够帮助客户创新并加速业务增长。
